duties_responsibilities.duty: Set-up and clean-up of banquet functions, ensuring all patrons are served during events.
Maintain a high level of professionalism and ensure banquet area is clean and organized.
Greet and assist guests, present menus, and take food and beverage orders.
Assist in food preparation, cooking, and ensuring food and beverage quality.
Monitor assigned section and ensure all patrons are served during events.
Maintain kitchen and wait station by keeping the area tidy and clean.
Report tips properly for tax processing and perform other assigned duties.
